mapper.update:
update evidence_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
original_md5 = #{originalMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serial_code = #{serialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_encrypted = #{isEncrypted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
encrypt_algorithm = #{encryptAlgorithm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_sign = #{userSign,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
tsa_auth = #{tsaAuth,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update evidence_info set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_md5 = #{originalMd5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_code = #{serialCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, block_id = #{blockId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_encrypted = #{isEncrypted,jdbcType=TINYINT}, encrypt_algorithm = #{encryptAlgorithm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sign = #{userSign,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY}, tsa_auth = #{tsaAuth,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
